alert.note: Alert for Benton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 2:54PM CDT until April 15 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Benton County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 254 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bentonville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Rogers... Bentonville... Bella Vista... Lowell... Pea Ridge... Cave Springs... Highfill... Gateway... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Hiwasse... Miller... Centerton... Avoca... Hill Top... Beaver Lake... Walnut Hill... Vaughn... Monte Ne... Larue... Healing Springs... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 79 and 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
